DellOemUpdateService.description: This version was introduced to add Oem Links in UpdateService resource.
DellOemUpdateService.longDescription: This version was introduced to add Oem Links in UpdateService resource.

DellSoftwareInventoryCollection.longDescription: A reference to a DellSoftwareInventoryCollection resource.

SMCUpdateConfig.longDescription: This property shall contain the read and Write the SMCUpdateConfig.

Install.deprecated: This Action has been deprecated in favor of DMTF SimpleUpdate Action.
Install.description: This action is used to install firmware inventory instances
Install.longDescription: This action shall perform install of firmware inventory instances

InstallUpon.description: The type of Install Upon option, default value is NextReboot if not provided by user
InstallUpon.longDescription: The type of Install Upon option, default value is NextReboot if not provided by user

SoftwareIdentityURIs.longDescription: Contains the relative URIs of the firmware inventory components to be installed, only one component installation at a time is allowed.

enumDescriptions.NextReboot: To indicate install on next reboot

RecoverFirmware.description: This action shall recover BOSS controller firmware in case of root of trust (RoT) failure.
RecoverFirmware.longDescription: This action shall recover BOSS controller firmware in case of root of trust (RoT) failure.

TargetFQDD.description: This Parameter is the FQDD of the BOSS Controller.
TargetFQDD.longDescription: This Parameter is the FQDD of the BOSS Controller.

WriteProtected.description: This property indicates the enabled and disabled states of an WriteProtect. This property indicates whether inband firmware updates are supported.
WriteProtected.longDescription: This property indicates the enabled and disabled states of an WriteProtect. This property indicates whether inband firmware updates are supported. A value of true indicates that inband firmware updates are supported, while false value indicates that they are not supported.
